name: Attempting to log on without the required roles

testSteps.description: Given I am an unauthorized AIB staff member
When I attempt to log into the Application

children.description: Login staff member: User [staffID=51601, staffFirstName=Jude, staffLastName=Regan, region=ROI, application=oneview, platform=tablet, password=United12, branchName=DIT Aungier Street, nsc=931012]

testSteps.description: Then I should receive an Authorisation Error

userStory.storyName: In order to prevent unauthorized access to non-AIB-staff members, as a system admin, I want valid users to authenticate before they access customer information
